summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from Franklin Avenue to Eastlake Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 631 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
